sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_entitlement.SysCustomDBObjectDAO</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description>DAO class to retrieve data related to sys_custom_db_object table</description>
        <name>SysCustomDBObjectDAO</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var SysCustomDBObjectDAO = Class.create();
SysCustomDBObjectDAO.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    isCustomTable: function(tableName) {
        var custObjGR = new GlideRecord(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SYS_CUSTOM_DB_OBJECT);
        if (custObjGR.isValid() && custObjGR.isValidField(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SOURCE) &&
            custObjGR.isValidField(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SOURCE_TYPE)) {
            custObjGR.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SOURCE_TYPE, LicensingEngineConstants.TABLE);
            custObjGR.addQuery(LicensingEngineDBConstants.SOURCE, tableName);
            custObjGR.query();
            return custObjGR.hasNext();
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'SysCustomDBObjectDAO'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2023-02-28 08:34:24</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>7232d4e1771121109c62f5f3cb5a999f</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>SysCustomDBObjectDAO</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Licensing Engine" source="sn_entitlement">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Licensing Engine">bcadabf277f311109c62f5f3cb5a992a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7232d4e1771121109c62f5f3cb5a999f</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-02-28 08:34:24</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
